entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28 except minus 32 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 except minus 32 inland and over higher terrain. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
